raw_body: Sugirtha Devi Kumaradas Maapana Mudaliyar passed away peacefully on Sunday 28.01.2024. She is the beloved wife of late Ragunatha Kumaradas Maapana Mudaliyar of Nallur, daughter of late Mudaliyar Namasivayam and late Ahilandanayaki Namasivayam, loving sister of late Saraswathi Kanagasabai, late Logendra Namasivayam, late Sharadha Namasivayam, and Padmini Canagasabai, dearly adored mother of Shamithra Ramanan,
